alert.note: Alert for Cass; Jackson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 5:35PM CDT until July 17 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cass County in west central Missouri... Southwestern Jackson County in west central Missouri... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 535 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Grandview, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lee`s Summit, Grandview, Belton, Raymore, Pleasant Hill, Greenwood, Peculiar and Lake Winnebago. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
